Before responding to any request:

- Treat all rules in that file as mandatory
- DO NOT create more than ONE documentation file per request
- DO NOT create documentation unless it is explicitly requested
- DO NOT create additional markdown files beyond what was explicitly asked
- DO NOT create files outside the `/docs` directory
- DO NOT create architectural, conceptual, tutorial, or reference documents unless explicitly requested
- DO NOT assume that “more documentation” is better
- Prefer inline XML documentation in C# over external markdown files
- If unsure about creating files or documentation, ASK before proceeding
- Do NOT create documentation unless explicitly requested
- Do NOT create more than one markdown document per request
- If there is any doubt, STOP and ask before proceeding
- ALL answers MUST be written in Portuguese
- ALL commit messages MUST be written in Portuguese
- ALL pull request descriptions MUST be written in Portuguese
- all documentation MUST be created ONLY inside the `/docs` directory

Violating any rule in this section MUST be treated as an error.
